message: What is in the house grill

The House Grill category includes several dishes such as Halloumi & Vegetable with Fig Jam, Sesame Ginger & Soya Tofu, Miso Glazed Aubergine, Cajun Buttered Corn, Chicken Breast, Sous Vide Chicken, Angry Chicken, Roasted Half Chicken, Beef Steak, and Salmon Steak. If you would like more information about a specific item or are ready to place an order, please let me know!
I want to order the ginger and soya tofu

Great! I found Ginger & Soya Tofu on our menu for AED 25. Would you like to place an order for this item? Please respond with 'yes' to confirm or 'no' to cancel. If you want to continue, please provide your NYU ID (8 digits), Building Number (A1A, A2B, etc.), and your phone number in the UAE format (e.g., 9715XXXXXXX). Do you have any special requests for your order? (like extra toppings, dietary restrictions, etc.)

To place an order for the Ginger & Soya Tofu, I'll need some information from you. Firstly, your NYU ID is needed as an 8-digit number. Next, please provide the building where you are currently located, such as A1A, A1B, A1C, A2A, A2B, A2C, A3, A4, A5A, A5B, A5C, A6A, A6B, or A6C. Lastly, I'll need your phone number in the UAE format (e.g., 9715XXXXXXX). Do you have any special requests for your order? (like extra toppings, dietary restrictions, etc.) If so, please let me know.
My NYU ID is 12345678, my Building number is A5A, and my Phone number is +971 503456786 and I don't have any special requests
